preview.html: The meaning of the ostrich bird for a single, married, pregnant or divorced woman, whether it was slaughtered by eating meat and eggs according to Ibn Sirin and other ostrich. Everyone who saw an ostrich in a dream according to reliable translators until you learn its interpretation. We remind you that dreams differ from one person to another and that dreams are always based on the details of each person’s dream. Interpretation of an ostrich in a dream: an ostrich In a dream, an Arab Bedouin woman and the oppressor are an Arab Bedouin. It was said: The ostrich is a blessing. He rode an ostrich and rode postal horses. Ostriches appear deaf because they cannot hear. He said: We know her name. Whoever sees a motionless ostrich in his house, his life will be long. And whoever sees that he slaughtered an ostrich, he will marry a female slave. Interpretation of a dream about an ostrich by Ibn Shaheen: The male ostrich is a male and the female is a female. And whoever sees: that he rode an ostrich and flew in the sky and returned to earth, then he travels with the Bedouins and returns safely, and if he does not return, then his interpretation is the opposite. And whoever dreams: that he hits an ostrich Or its king, then he defiles a Bedouin or a maid. And whoever dreams: that he is riding an ostrich, then he is doing a prohibited act. And whoever dreams: that he is the king of an ostrich, then he can obtain money from a Bedouin. And whoever sees: that he is carrying an ostrich, then a blessing and a moment will come. And he said: A woman saw that Her husband came from a trip on an ostrich, so she told her dream to Sheikh Yusuf Al-Karbi, and he said: Your husband will bring you a blessing, so it was like this, then he. She traveled again and also saw that he came with two ostriches, so she told this dream about the sheikh, and he said to her: Your husband will come with two ostriches and he is near. He came as I told him, then he traveled for the third time, and his wife also saw that he had come from his trip with three ostriches, so she was happy about that and came to the sheikh, thinking about him as before. Some of the advanced sheikhs: Whoever dreams that he is riding an ostrich or its king pollutes a woman or a slave woman’s feathers because it pollutes the Bedouin of money and goodness. And whoever sees that he is carrying an ostrich comes immediately. The ostrich: The Bedouin who owns or rides it, and has an owner, and her beauty, and her stature, and announces her castration because she is tall, and is not Neither a bird nor an animal. It also appears as najib because it does not precede, and it appears as deaf because it does not hear, and it is a blessing for whoever owns it or buys it unless he has a sick person, and if he has a sick person, it is his obituary. And whoever sees in his house an inanimate, long-lived and blessed ostrich, and his son’s chick, And his daughters’ eggs. If the Sultan sees an ostrich in them, then he has a eunuch servant who protects the maids. Seeing an ostrich in a dream means that you do not acknowledge reality and are trying to avoid it. Although it is a myth, the ostrich is famous in people's minds as the animal that hides its head in the dirt to hide from danger. To dream of an ostrich means that you are trying to deny something real and that there is something that you refuse to acknowledge even though it is clear to everyone. title: Why do dead people come in a dream?

preview.html: Why do the dead come in a dream? There are many dreams and visions that a person sees during his sleep, which often cause him anxiety and fears, especially if they are not current or new dreams that he sees for the first time. In the following, we will learn about the interpretation of seeing the dead in a dream, to discover why the dead come in a dream. Interpretation of seeing the dead alive in a dream by Ibn Sirin The dream and seeing the dead alive in a dream are dreams that sometimes cause fear and anxiety for dreamers, and its interpretation has many indications that Ibn Sirin reached, which we present in the following points: If a person sees a dead person in his dream, and he is alive and speaking, this indicates the good that has come to him, and reflects the status of the dead in heaven and his comfort and enjoyment in the afterlife. The interpretation of this vision symbolizes that everything the dead say is the truth. The interpretation of dreams indicates learning from him and extracting some information that the dreamer has overlooked. Is what the dead says in a dream true? We often wonder whether what the dead says in a dream is true, and in this, Sheikh Al-Nabulsi, may God preserve him, says in his interpretation that he sees the dead talking and the talk with the dead in a dream that the dead tells us about himself or about others suggests the truth, so the dead is in the house of truth with God Almighty, and engages in falsehood and entertainment, knowing that seeing the dead in a dream means that He lives in the shrine of the martyrs. Why do the dead come to the living in a dream? In the interpretation of the coming of the dead in a dream, it comes to express many indications and many signs that the scholars of interpretation and jurists have reached in this field, and the interpretation of this vision expresses the following: The deceased's visit to the living means that he carries a specific message that he wants to convey. The dead person often comes in a dream, especially when he is dying. The reason for visiting the deceased in a dream comes to the living because of a strong longing for the dead, especially if the deceased is a relative or lover. The meaning of seeing a dead person in a dream Seeing a dead person in a dream carries in its interpretation many suggestions and signs that express him, as they appeared in the interpretations of scholars' interpretations. Seeing death in a dream expresses the following indications: It means good. Return of deposits. Saving the patient from his illness. Releasing the prisoner from his prison. Meeting the absent. Lack of debts and corruption. Rise in the world. Insufficient condition. The speed of wealth for the poor. The death of the prophets, peace be upon them, is evidence of the weakness of religion. The death of the scholar shows the emergence of heresies in religion. The death of parents indicates the narrowness of life. The death of the wife indicates the absence of the scholar. The death of the boy indicates the disappearance of the male. The death of brothers indicates the death of enemies. The dead polytheists indicate enemies. Obtaining sustenance from the dead. Talking to the dead is a long life. With these clues and information, we know why the dead comes in a dream, as we learned about the interpretation of this vision from Ibn Sirin, and the clues that express it, and discussing everything the dead says is true, he is with God, Lord of the Worlds, the place of truth and at that time he is busy with lying and God knows best.
